content.en: Cryo-EM Algorithm Advancements: Scientists are using algorithms to solve complex problems in the field of protein structure determination using cryo-electron microscopy (cryo-EM). These algorithms, such as the NORMA software suite, EM-Fold computational protein structure prediction algorithm, and cryoSPARC algorithms, are being used to fit high-resolution protein structures into low-resolution density maps, fold α-helical proteins, refine cryo-EM structures, construct protein structure models, and validate the quality of map-to-atomic model fit. These advancements in algorithmic approaches are enabling rapid and automated cryo-EM structure determination, improving the accuracy and efficiency of protein structure modeling.
content.da: Cryo-EM Algoritmefremskridt: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at løse komplekse problemer inden for proteinkonstruktionsbestemmelse ved hjælp af cryo-elektronmikroskopi (cryo-EM). Disse algoritmer, såsom NORMA softwarepakken, EM-Fold beregningsalgoritme til proteinstrukturprediktion og cryoSPARC-algoritmer, bruges til at passe højopløsningsproteiner ind i lavopløsningsdensitetskort, folde α-helixproteiner, raffinere cryo-EM-strukturer, konstruere proteinkonstruktionsmodeller og validere kvaliteten af kort-til-atom-modeltilpasninger. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmiske tilgange muliggør hurtig og automatiseret cryo-EM strukturbestemmelse, hvilket forbedrer nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af proteinkonstruktionsmodellering.
